name: Tiny Story 4 adventure
description:
With Tiny Story 4 - Mimy and the witch of flowers, experience a fantastic adventure full of puzzles to solve. Many quests await you in this new opus of Tiny Story adventure.

This game remains in the tradition of its predecessors, a cute point-and-click adventure game, full of interesting puzzles, cute, fun, without advertising nor violence.

Relax by playing the character of Mimy who broke by accident a precious glassflower. The witch can help you with the creation of the magic potion that will cure the glassflower... but where is the witch? Why a strange magical plant is crying in her house. An odd curse seems to have reached the witch's manor. Be creative, find the missing witch, help the magical plant. It's up to you to solve this strange mystery.

Besides the puzzles, there are adorable stickers hidden in the game. Can you find them all?

Walkthrough videos are available to help you if you are stuck with the puzzles of the game.
